title: Anurag Gotety
short: I am a Full-stack engineer with a passion for UI/UX, AR gaming, and creative tech. I build immersive, performant apps blending design, systems thinking, and real-world interactivity.
long: I'm a full-stack software engineer with a background in game programming and film production. I build immersive, UI-rich experiences at the intersection of design, storytelling, and interactivity. From React Native AR games to cinematic 3D portfolios, my work blends technical depth with creative expression.
